name: Paeonia
Relationship: Compare: GLECHOMA - Ground Ivy - (rectal symptom). HAMAN.; SIL.; AESC.; RATANH. (GREAT CONSTRICTION of anus; stools forced with great effort). Antidotes: RATANH.; ALOE.

Head: Nervous
Burning in eyes and ringing in ears
Vertigo when moving
Rush of blood to head and face
Rectum: Biting, itching in anus; orifice swollen
Atrocious pains with and after each stool
Hemorrhoids, fissures, ulceration of anus and perineum, purple, covered with crusts
Painful ulcer, oozing offensive moisture on perineum
Burning in anus after stool; then internal chilliness
Fistula ani, diarrhoea, with anal burning and internal chilliness
Sudden, pasty diarrhoea, with faintness in abdomen
Chest: Dull shooting from to back through heart
Skin: Ulcers below coccyx, around sacrum; varicose veins
Ulcers in general, from pressure, bedsores, etc. itching, burning, as from nettles
Extremities: Pain in wrist and fingers; knees and toes

details: The rectal and anal symptoms are most important. Chronic ulcers on lower parts of body, leg, foot, toes, also breast, rectum.
